DOC.criteria: Refractory Brain Metastases At least 1 measurable intracranial lesion define RECIST ECOG less equal 1 Adequate hematology/organ function No baseline peripheral central neuropathy grade 1 Hypersensitivity Cremophor EL Pregnant Lactating Spinal Cord Compression Preexisting dementia/cognitive disfunction Require Neupogen Neulasta Maintain Neutrophil Count Have Primary Brain Cancer Have History Ischemic Heart Disease Have Diabetes
